article.title: Argon ST to Provide Advanced ISR Capability to U.S. Army
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Argon ST Incorporated has been awarded an $11 million contract to deliver advanced Intelligence Surveillance Reconnaissance (ISR) capabilities and systems to the U.S. Army Communications-Electronics Command. Argon will provide the Army with advanced ISR capabilities based on its Prism product, which is designed to enable users to maintain a tactical advantage through rapid insertion of software enhancements.
